todos.title: Dust Fans
todos.notes: Use blade cleaner to catch all the dust. Wear PPE to protect face and nose.

todos.title: Organize Garage
todos.notes: Use plastic bins and label each one! They can stack on shelf or in the attic

todos.title: Paint Deck
todos.notes: Use Sherman Williams Deck Wash to prep and Charwood color Top Deck Stain.

todos.title: Detail SUV
todos.notes: Use Turtlewax, and don't forget to to the rims. Also, don'r forget to vacuum the trunk.

todos.title: Organize Plants
todos.notes: Re-pot and throw away any dead plants! Also, put empty pots into shed.

todos.title: Paint Bathroom
todos.notes: Make sure to clean the walls first and tape off the corners and lay down plastic.

todos.title: Sweep Garage
todos.notes: Make sure to sweep all corners! Use the leaf blower when done.

todos.title: Clean out Refrigerator
todos.notes: Throw away all old food. Take out all shelves and wash thoroughly.

todos.title: Clean out front and backyard
todos.notes: Make sure to organize all dog toys. Also rake any leaves and fallen branches.
